channel.title: Cinema Guild on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Cinema Guild on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Toronto Film ‘Dry Leaf’ Finds North American Home with Cinema Guild (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Cinema Guild has bought North American distribution rights to “Dry Leaf,” Georgian filmmaker Alexandre Koberidze’s follow up to “What Do We See When We Look at the Sky?”
